Docs.summary: Provides support to communicate with USB hardware peripherals that are connected to Android-powered devices.

remarks.para: Provides support to communicate with USB hardware peripherals that are connected to Android-powered devices.
For more information, see the USB guide.

Use to access the state of the USB and to communicate with connected hardware peripherals. Use to communicate with the hardware peripheral if the Android-powered device is acting as the USB host. Use if the peripheral is acting as the USB host.
